classes.name: Barbarian
classes.description: Barbarians use their martial prowess and primal rage to strengthen themselves and dominate enemies in combat.
classes.equipment_proficiencies: Simple weapons, Martial weapons, Light armour, Medium armour, Shields
classes.skill_proficiencies: Choose 2: Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Survival, Perception
classes.starting_equipment: Greataxe, Handaxe x2, Barbarian Clothes, Leather Boots

subclasses.name: Wildheart
subclasses.description: Barbarians with this subclass can choose a Bestial Heart, granting them abilities linked to animals.

features.feature_description: Choose an animal aspect that grants specific abilities.
Gain an additional animal aspect for more abilities.
Move through difficult terrain without slowing down.

subclasses.name: Berserker
subclasses.description: Berserkers channel their rage into a Frenzy, allowing them to make frenzied strikes and throws.

features.feature_description: Enter a Frenzy that grants Frenzied Strike and Enraged Throw.
You cannot be charmed or frightened while raging.
Frighten a creature within range using your presence.

subclasses.name: Wild Magic
subclasses.description: Wild Magic Barbarians harness chaotic forces, gaining magical abilities and effects while raging.

features.feature_description: Your Rage is infused with wild magic, creating random magical effects.
You or an ally gain temporary bonuses from magical effects, including spell slots and boons.
If you take damage while raging, you can cause a random wild magic effect to occur.

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: Bards are expert storytellers, artists, and performers. Bards channel their power through song, speech, or performance to cast spells.
classes.equipment_proficiencies: Simple weapons, Hand Crossbows, Rapiers, Longswords, Shortswords, Light armour
classes.skill_proficiencies: Choose 3: History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, Religion, Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Acrobatics, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, Animal Handling, Arcana, Investigation, Athletics, Nature, Perception, Survival
classes.starting_equipment: Hand Crossbow, Simple Jerkin, Leather Boots, Instrument

class_progression.features: Song of Rest, Jack of All Trades
Improved Bardic Inspiration (d8), Font of Inspiration
Improved Bardic Inspiration (d10), Expertise, Magical Secrets

subclasses.name: College of Lore
subclasses.description: Bards in the College of Lore use their skills to manipulate, deceive, and entertain.

features.feature_description: Use your wit to reduce the effectiveness of an opponent's attack or ability.
Learn two spells from any class's spell list.

subclasses.name: College of Valour
subclasses.description: Bards in the College of Valour inspire bravery in their allies and lead them into battle.

features.feature_description: Use Bardic Inspiration to boost your allies' attack damage or Armour Class.
You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

subclasses.name: College of Swords
subclasses.description: Bards in the College of Swords focus on combat, using their skills to perform flourishes in battle.

features.feature_description: Perform combat flourishes to enhance your attacks with additional effects.
Choose a fighting style: Duelling or Two-Weapon Fighting.
You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: Clerics worship and enact their deities' will to the world, for better or worse. They channel the power of their faith to cast spells.
classes.equipment_proficiencies: Simple weapons, Flails, Morningstars, Light armour, Medium armour, Shields
classes.skill_proficiencies: Choose 2: History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, Religion
classes.starting_equipment: Mace, Chain Shirt, Studded Shield, Leather Boots

subclasses.name: Life
subclasses.description: Life Clerics are devoted to preserving life and healing the wounded.

features.feature_description: Your healing spells are more effective.
Channel divinity to restore health to allies within range.
When you heal others with a spell, you also heal yourself.
Your weapon attacks deal extra radiant damage.

subclasses.name: Light
subclasses.description: Light Clerics wield the power of flame and radiance, using light to burn away darkness and evil.

features.feature_description: Use your reaction to impose disadvantage on an attacker that you can see.
Channel divinity to dispel darkness and deal radiant damage to nearby enemies.
Your Warding Flare ability now grants additional protection.
Add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with Cleric cantrips.

subclasses.name: Trickery
subclasses.description: Trickery Clerics are deceitful, using guile and illusion to further their deities' plans.

features.feature_description: Grant advantage on Stealth checks to a creature you touch.
Channel divinity to create an illusory duplicate of yourself.
Channel divinity to become invisible.
Your weapon attacks deal extra poison damage.

subclasses.name: Knowledge
subclasses.description: Knowledge Clerics are seekers of truth, using their understanding to enlighten and guide others.

features.feature_description: Gain proficiency in two skills and double your proficiency bonus with them.
Channel divinity to gain proficiency in any skill or tool for 10 minutes.
Channel divinity to read a creature's thoughts and cast the Suggestion spell without expending a spell slot.
Add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with Cleric cantrips.

subclasses.name: Nature
subclasses.description: Nature Clerics are protectors of the natural world, channeling the primal forces of nature.

features.feature_description: Gain proficiency in the Nature skill and learn an additional druid cantrip.
Channel divinity to charm animals and plants.
Channel divinity to grant resistance to a chosen damage type to allies within range.
Your weapon attacks deal extra elemental damage (fire, cold, lightning, or acid).

subclasses.name: Tempest
subclasses.description: Tempest Clerics wield the power of storms, calling down lightning and thunder upon their foes.

features.feature_description: Use your reaction to deal lightning or thunder damage to an attacker.
Channel divinity to maximize the damage of your lightning or thunder spells.
Your lightning damage knocks enemies prone.
Your weapon attacks deal extra thunder damage.

subclasses.name: War
subclasses.description: War Clerics are fierce warriors, leading their allies into battle with divine strength and protection.

features.feature_description: When you take the Attack action, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.
Channel divinity to add +10 to an attack roll.
Channel divinity to grant a +10 bonus to an ally's attack roll.
Your weapon attacks deal extra damage of the weapon's type (e.g., slashing, piercing).

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: Druids are closely attuned with nature and the animals that live in it. They utilize the power of nature to cast spells and have the ability to transform into various creatures.
classes.equipment_proficiencies: Clubs, Daggers, Javelins, Maces, Quarterstaves, Scimitars, Sickles, Spears, Light armour, Medium armour, Shields
classes.skill_proficiencies: Choose 2: Arcana, Animal Handling, Insight, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Religion, Survival
classes.starting_equipment: Druid Quarterstaff, Druid Leather Armour, Grovetender Boots

subclasses.name: Circle of the Land
subclasses.description: Circle of the Land Druids are focused on maintaining the balance of nature and are granted powers based on their chosen land.

features.feature_description: Regain expended spell slots during a short rest.
Gain additional spells based on your chosen land type.
Move through difficult terrain without expending extra movement.
Immunity to poison and disease, cannot be charmed or frightened by elementals or fey.

subclasses.name: Circle of the Moon
subclasses.description: Circle of the Moon Druids are fierce guardians of the wild, with the ability to transform into more powerful beasts.

features.feature_description: Wild shaping now uses a Bonus action instead of an Action.
Use spell slots to heal while in Wild Shape.
Your attacks in Wild Shape count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.
Gain the ability to transform into elementals.

subclasses.name: Circle of the Spores
subclasses.description: Circle of the Spores Druids find beauty in decay, using the spores of fungi to bolster their powers and summon undead.

features.feature_description: Deal necrotic damage to creatures within 10 feet.
Gain temporary hit points and enhance your Halo of Spores damage when you use Wild Shape.
Animate a corpse with spores, turning it into a zombie under your control.
Release spores in a 10-foot cube to damage enemies and create difficult terrain.

classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: Fighters use their martial expertise to fight enemies and support their allies in combat.
classes.equipment_proficiencies: Simple weapons, Martial weapons, Light armour, Medium armour, Heavy armour, Shields
classes.skill_proficiencies: Choose 2: Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, History, Insight, Intimidation, Perception, Survival

subclasses.name: Battle Master
subclasses.description: Battle Masters employ martial techniques and superior tactics to outmaneuver and defeat their foes.

features.feature_description: Gain 4 Superiority Dice (d8). Choose 3 Battle Manoeuvres.
Choose 2 additional Manoeuvres, gain +1 Superiority Die (d8).
Your Superiority Dice become d10s. Choose 2 additional Manoeuvres.

subclasses.name: Eldritch Knight
subclasses.description: Eldritch Knights combine martial prowess with arcane magic to dominate the battlefield.

features.feature_description: Bond a weapon to yourself, making it unable to be disarmed and summonable.
When you use your action to cast a cantrip, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.
When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, it has disadvantage on saving throws against spells you cast until the end of your next turn.

subclasses.name: Champion
subclasses.description: Champions focus on raw physical power, mastering combat techniques to deliver deadly critical hits.

features.feature_description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.
You gain proficiency in Acrobatics, and your jump distance is increased.
Choose an additional Fighting Style.

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: Monks are unarmed combatants capable of spending Ki Points to perform special abilities.
classes.skill_proficiencies: Choose 2: History, Insight, Religion, Acrobatics, Stealth, Athletics

class_progression.features: Unarmoured Defence, Martial Arts: Dextrous Attacks, Martial Arts: Deft Strikes, Flurry of Blows
Unarmoured Movement, Patient Defence, Step of the Wind
Ki-Empowered Strikes, Subclass feature, Improved Unarmoured Movement
Purity of Body, Improved Unarmoured Movement

subclasses.name: Way of the Four Elements
subclasses.description: Monks who follow this path can manipulate the elements to enhance their attacks and defenses.

features.feature_description: Select 3 subclass spells from the elements to cast using Ki Points.
Select additional elemental spells to cast.
Further mastery of elemental spells and abilities.

subclasses.name: Way of the Open Hand
subclasses.description: Monks who follow the Way of the Open Hand are masters of martial arts combat, focusing on pure physical power.

features.feature_description: Enhance your Flurry of Blows to knock down or push enemies.
Enhance your body, mind, and soul through martial training.
Achieve a state of peace that grants you various defensive benefits.

subclasses.name: Way of Shadow
subclasses.description: Monks who follow the Way of Shadow are stealthy ninjas, using their ki to perform shadowy feats.

features.feature_description: Gain access to various shadow-based abilities like Pass Without Trace, Darkness, and more.
Teleport from one shadow to another, gaining a tactical advantage in combat.
Unleash powerful shadow-based attacks that deal devastating damage.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: Paladins are masters of a variety of weapons and armour, channeling the power of their sacred oaths.
classes.equipment_proficiencies: Simple weapons, Martial weapons, Light armour, Medium armour, Heavy armour, Shields
classes.skill_proficiencies: Choose 2: Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, Religion
classes.starting_equipment: Warhammer, Javelin x2, Scale Mail, Leather Boots, Paladin Oaths and their Tenets

class_progression.features: Divine Sense, Lay on Hands, Channel Oath, Choose a subclass

class_progression.spell_slots: 4 Level 1 Spell Slots, 2 Level 2 Spell Slots
3 Level 2 Spell Slots, 2 Level 3 Spell Slots

subclasses.name: Oath of the Ancients
subclasses.description: Paladins who take the Oath of the Ancients are guardians of nature, protecting the light and life in the world.

features.feature_description: Use your Channel Oath to heal nearby allies.
Channel Oath ability that restrains foes with magical vines.
You and your allies within the aura take less damage from spells.

subclasses.name: Oath of Devotion
subclasses.description: Paladins who take the Oath of Devotion hold themselves to the highest standards of honor, protecting the weak and fighting for justice.

features.feature_description: Use your Channel Oath to protect your allies with divine light.
Channel Oath ability that imbues your weapon with positive energy.
You and your allies within the aura are immune to being charmed.

subclasses.name: Oath of Vengeance
subclasses.description: Paladins who take the Oath of Vengeance seek retribution against those who have committed grave wrongs.

features.feature_description: Use your Channel Oath to strike fear into your enemies.
Channel Oath ability that targets a foe for retribution.
When you hit a creature with an opportunity attack, you can move up to half your speed after the attack.

subclasses.name: Oathbreaker
subclasses.description: Paladins who have broken their sacred oaths and become Oathbreakers channel dark powers in their quest for revenge.

features.feature_description: Use your Channel Oath to inflict suffering upon your enemies.
Channel Oath ability that seizes control of undead creatures.
You and your undead allies within the aura deal additional necrotic damage.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: Rangers are unrivalled scouts and trackers, honing a deep connection with nature in order to hunt their favoured prey.
classes.equipment_proficiencies: Simple weapons, Martial weapons, Light armour, Medium armour, Shields
classes.skill_proficiencies: Choose 3: Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, Survival
classes.starting_equipment: Shortbow, Leather Armour (green variant), Leather Boots, Arrow of Ice

class_progression.spell_slots: 4 Level 1 Spell Slots, 2 Level 2 Spell Slots
3 Level 2 Spell Slots, 2 Level 3 Spell Slots

class_progression.features: Favoured Enemy, Natural Explorer, Hide in Plain Sight

subclasses.name: Hunter
subclasses.description: Hunters are skilled in tracking and bringing down their chosen prey, whether it's a single target or multiple foes.

features.feature_description: Choose one: Colossus Slayer, Giant Killer, or Horde Breaker to specialize in your hunting techniques.
Choose one: Escape the Horde, Steel Will, or Multiattack Defence for enhanced survivability.
Choose one: Perform a ranged volley or a melee whirlwind attack to hit multiple enemies.

subclasses.name: Beast Master
subclasses.description: Beast Masters have formed a bond with a beast companion, fighting alongside them in the wild.

features.feature_description: Summon a beast companion to fight alongside you, choosing from a bear, boar, dire raven, wolf, or wolf spider.
Your beast companion gains additional hit points and enhanced abilities.
Your beast companion can make two attacks when you command it to attack.

subclasses.name: Gloom Stalker
subclasses.description: Gloom Stalkers are adept at exploring the dark, using the cover of darkness to strike fear into their enemies.

features.feature_description: Gain a bonus to initiative rolls, and on the first turn of combat, you can make an extra attack.
Gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws, or expertise if already proficient.
If you miss with an attack, you can make another attack as part of the same action.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: Rogues are well versed in the art of stealth and rely on their resourcefulness to be in control of any challenging situation.
classes.equipment_proficiencies: Simple weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords, Light armour
classes.skill_proficiencies: Choose 4: Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, Stealth
classes.starting_equipment: Shortsword, Leather Armour (purple variant), Leather Boots, Thieves' Tools, Grease Bottle x2

class_progression.features: Cunning Action: Dash, Cunning Action: Disengage, Cunning Action: Hide

subclasses.name: Thief
subclasses.description: Thieves are rogues who focus on agility and speed, excelling in stealth and quick strikes.

features.feature_description: Gain an additional Bonus action for Cunning Actions.
You can climb faster and take no damage from falling 6 meters or less.
You have Advantage on Stealth checks when moving at half speed.

subclasses.name: Arcane Trickster
subclasses.description: Arcane Tricksters are rogues who enhance their skills with arcane magic, using spells to outwit foes.

features.feature_description: Gain Mage Hand with enhanced abilities, allowing you to use it to pickpocket or disarm traps.
Choose 2 additional Cantrips from the Wizard spell list.
If you are hidden from a creature when you cast a spell on it, the creature has Disadvantage on its saving throw.

subclasses.name: Assassin
subclasses.description: Assassins are rogues who specialize in infiltration, quick kills, and surprise attacks.

features.feature_description: Gain a Bonus to initiative and can prepare for an ambush.
You have Advantage on attack rolls against surprised enemies.
Gain a bonus to initiative rolls and critical hit against surprised targets.
You can create a false identity and establish cover with no suspicion.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.description: Sorcerers use their innate magical powers to fight enemies and aid allies in combat.
classes.skill_proficiencies: Choose 2: Arcana, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, Religion
classes.starting_equipment: Quarterstaff, Sorcerer Robe (variant depends on subclass), Simple Boots

class_progression.spell_slots_per_level: 2 Level 1 Spell Slots

subclasses.name: Wild Magic
subclasses.description: Wild Magic Sorcerers wield chaotic magic that can unleash unpredictable effects during combat.

features.feature_description: Manipulate the forces of chance and chaos, giving yourself advantage on one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.
Use your reaction and spend 2 sorcery points to add or subtract 1d4 to another creature's roll.
You gain more control over your wild magic surges.

subclasses.name: Draconic Bloodline
subclasses.description: Draconic Bloodline Sorcerers inherit magical power from an ancient draconic ancestor.

features.feature_description: Your hit points increase, and you gain an AC bonus based on your draconic heritage.
Gain resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry and add your Charisma modifier to the damage.
You can sprout dragon wings and gain a flying speed equal to your current speed.

subclasses.name: Storm Sorcery
subclasses.description: Storm Sorcerers can harness the power of the storms, controlling lightning and wind.

features.feature_description: Use bonus action to cause whirling gusts of elemental air to briefly surround you, letting you fly.
You gain resistance to lightning and thunder damage, and when you start casting a spell, a storm aura surrounds you.
When hit by a melee attack, you can use your reaction to deal lightning damage to the attacker.

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: Warlocks channel their patron's pact magic to fight enemies and aid allies in combat.
classes.skill_proficiencies: Choose 2: Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, Religion

subclasses.name: The Fiend
subclasses.description: The Fiend Warlocks forge a pact with a fiend from the lower planes, gaining destructive and fiery power.

features.feature_description: Gain temporary hit points whenever you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points.
Add a d10 to your ability check or saving throw, which you can use after you see the roll but before its outcome.
Gain resistance to a damage type of your choice at the start of each short or long rest.

subclasses.name: The Great Old One
subclasses.description: The Great Old One Warlocks form a pact with an ancient being of the eldritch realms, wielding madness and forbidden knowledge.

features.feature_description: Inflict fear on a creature after dealing critical damage to it.
Use your reaction to impose disadvantage on an attack roll made against you.
Gain resistance to psychic damage and reflect it back to the attacker.

subclasses.name: The Archfey
subclasses.description: The Archfey Warlocks make a pact with a powerful fey, granting them the abilities to charm and deceive.

features.feature_description: Frighten or charm creatures within 10 feet as an action.
Become invisible and teleport 60 feet away after taking damage.
Become immune to being charmed and reflect it back to the attacker.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: Wizards channel magic through their extensive knowledge of the arcane to fight enemies and aid allies in combat.
classes.skill_proficiencies: Arcana, History, Investigation, Insight, Medicine, Religion

subclasses.name: Abjuration School
subclasses.description: Wizards specializing in Abjuration focus on protective spells and magical wards.

features.feature_description: You can copy Abjuration spells into your spellbook for half the time and cost.
Create a magical ward that absorbs damage.
Extend your Arcane Ward to protect an ally within 30 feet.
Your abjuration spells are more effective and provide greater protection.

subclasses.name: Evocation School
subclasses.description: Wizards in the School of Evocation are adept at casting powerful offensive spells.

features.feature_description: You can copy Evocation spells into your spellbook for half the time and cost.
Create pockets of safety within your area of effect spells.
Your damaging cantrips are more effective against creatures that succeed on their saving throws.
Add your Intelligence modifier to the damage rolls of your Evocation spells.

subclasses.name: Necromancy School
subclasses.description: Necromancers manipulate the energies of life and death.

features.feature_description: You can copy Necromancy spells into your spellbook for half the time and cost.
Restore hit points when you kill a creature with a spell.
Your Animate Dead spell creates an additional undead creature and improves their effectiveness.
Gain resistance to necrotic damage, and your hit point maximum can't be reduced.

subclasses.name: Conjuration School
subclasses.description: Conjurers are specialists in summoning creatures and objects.

features.feature_description: You can copy Conjuration spells into your spellbook for half the time and cost.
Create a small object or a handful of water out of thin air.
Teleport yourself or an ally to a location you can see.
Your concentration can't be broken when you take damage.

subclasses.name: Enchantment School
subclasses.description: Enchanters manipulate the minds of others.

features.feature_description: You can copy Enchantment spells into your spellbook for half the time and cost.
Charm a creature with a mesmerizing gaze.
You can make an attacker target someone else instead of you.
You can target two creatures with a single enchantment spell.

subclasses.name: Divination School
subclasses.description: Diviners peer into the future and gain insights.

features.feature_description: You can copy Divination spells into your spellbook for half the time and cost.
Roll two d20s and record the results, which you can substitute for any roll later.
When you cast a divination spell, you regain a spell slot of a lower level.
Gain one of several divination-related abilities, such as darkvision or see invisibility.

subclasses.name: Illusion School
subclasses.description: Illusionists create visual deceptions.

features.feature_description: You can copy Illusion spells into your spellbook for half the time and cost.
Create more convincing illusions with your cantrip.
Create an illusory duplicate of yourself to confuse attackers.
Turn an illusion into reality for a short time.

subclasses.name: Transmutation School
subclasses.description: Transmuters alter the physical properties of objects and creatures.

features.feature_description: You can copy Transmutation spells into your spellbook for half the time and cost.
Transform one substance into another.
Create a magical stone that grants benefits like extra speed or darkvision.
You can transform your body to resist damage or avoid attacks.
